    EditEntryActivity

    public class AddNewActivity
extends androidx.appcompat.app.AppCompatActivity
    This class is for showing add new income or expense entry activity.
    Since:
    2020.04.20
    Version:
    1.7
    Author:
    Olli Pertovaara
